Getting Started with unify

$ unify build

Start building static HTML pages the peaceful, minimalist way. Zero frameworks, zero complexity, just HTML includes and head injection that works exactly as expected.

Build your site with a single command:

$ unify build --source src --output dist

Your site will be generated in dist/ with all includes resolved and head content injected.
